text:
December ID, 1953
Dr. Harry J. Skornia, Executive Director
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
14 Gregory Hall
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harry:
I believe - as Program Committee man - that Creshkoff and Hovey should
build their letters into the French and Italian radio systems so that
these letters will continue when they leave. Personal appearances won't
do this© I suggest the use of French and Italian speakers who know
General Manager, Station WGBH
